title: Simulation-based XR Solution Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and language education experience
context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling for workplace learning integrated with XR production practice in BYOD environments for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can write a planning document for XR content for language learning simulations
Learners can develop a basic language education simulation prototype using low-cost XR tools (e.g., Unity 3D, WebXR)
Learners can propose at least three evaluation rubrics for XR solutions tailored to actual corporate training scenarios

resources: XR Development Toolkit (Blender, Unity Base License)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
